contents.text: Some weeks, including this one, we publish more than one cover. In most of the world, we explore how fighting climate change and pursuing economic growth are interlinked projects, making the case for an environmentalism that builds.
Leader: The case for an environmentalism that buildsTechnology Quarterly: The electric grid is about to be transformedUnited States: America’s chance to become a clean-energy superpower
Meanwhile, in the United States we explore the issue of gender medicine, and argue that the evidence to support medicalised gender transitions in adolescents is worryingly weak.
Leader: What America has got wrong about gender medicine.Briefing: The evidence to support gender transitions in kids is worryingly weak.
